entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
